// Fact-o-real
// codechef peer problem

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main(){

	string in;
	while(cin>>in){
		int d=0;
		if(in == "#")
			break;
		else{
			int n = (atoi)(in.c_str());
			for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
				if(i==1)
					d++;
				else if (i==2)
					d+=4;
				else if (i==3)
					d+=9;
				else{
					switch(i%10){
						case 1:
						case 3:
						case 7:
						case 9:
							d++;
							break;
						
						case 2:
						case 4:
						case 6:
						case 8:
							d+=6;
							break;
						
						case 5:
							d+=5;
							break;
						
						case 10:
							break;
					
					}
				}
			}
			cout<<d%10<<endl;
		}
	}
	//system("PAUSE");
	return 0;
}
